name: Syntelli Solutions
tag_list: hyperion, hyperion-financial-management, hfm, oracle, hyperion-workforce-planning, epm, enterprise-performance-management, financial-reporting, consulting
overview:
Syntelli Solutions Inc. is a value focused consulting organization in Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) & Business Intelligence (BI) space. Our solutions enable organizations to reduce your their financial risk exposure, improve profitability and enhance business effectiveness and compliance profile.

Syntelli Solutions serve clients in Retail, Health Care, Hospitality/Services, Financial Services, Manufacturing verticals. Range of our client’s revenue is from $200M to $5B.

Syntelli Solutions is a Global Consulting and Reselling Partner of Oracle/Hyperion and offers BI and EPM implementation services in US, Middle East and Asia Pacific. Our specific solution expertise is in Planning & Budgeting, Consolidation (HFM), Performance Scorecards (Balanced Scorecard), Master Data Management solutions and OBIEE.
